document.full_text: the professional cycling teams' association is threatening to boycott the tour of beijing in october if the sport's governing body doesn't withdraw its proposed ban on radio communication during races by may 1.
document.title: cycling teams threaten boycott over radio feud
lines_and_colors: the professional cycling teams' association is threatening to boycott the tour of beijing in october if the sport's governing body doesn't withdraw its proposed ban on radio communication during races by may 1.
